<entry name="ArtilleryDescription" value="Indirect fire requires remote target acquisition, usually by a forward observer, but Pandora's unpredictable gravitational interference has made accurate long range artillery wildly unreliable.
Guided indirect artillery disposes of the human component in favor of a drone observer which can provide in-flight corrections to heavy ordnance projectiles for accurate bombardment over extreme ranges."/> <entry name="ArtilleryProperties" value="Artillery weapon
Double range splash attack
No enemy retaliation
No gain from armor when attacking
Damage proportionally lower with enemy missing health when attacking"/>
